name: Elektrik
summary:
Simple graphics, easy to learn gameplay and 35+ colours in four different collections to unlock and hours of fun to be had! 
 
Simply tap to rotate power cables to make sure no homes go without power, collecting Energy along the way to unlock new colours! 
 
With endless levels and a variety of map sizes, Elektrik makes the perfect partner for a morning coffee, a mid day break or a chilled out evening, with 50% of all profits helping to provide electricity in developing countries, as well as featuring tracks from up-and-coming electronic artists! 
 
Test your skills in Time Attack mode, racing against the clock, or take time out and relax in Zen Mode! The choice is yours. Have fun! 
 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sevengame.elektrik
storyline: I've always wanted to create a game which merges my love of game development with the want to make a change in the world. So that's what I've done - with half of all profits providing those in developing countries with electricity, providing them a better future.
